item.title: Simple Killer By Solemn Wishes
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

No script is undetectable but it relys on if the user is undetectable.

Dose the user make the character in question work like a slave? Yes -> detectable, No -> undetectable.

Dose the character have fun? Yes -> undetectable, No -> Detectable.

Dose the character have a weird sleeping pattern? Yes -> Detectable, No -> Un-detectable.

like 15% of the detectableness is baised on the script.

Read full topic

item.title: Simple Killer By Solemn Wishes
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

Ok I have found this “simple” killer that works pretty well. All you need to do is fill in the colors and let it run.
Note: When it can not find the “thing” with the color you specified, it lags horribly until another thing of that color comes back into veiw. If you just let the script continue to run, it will be just fine.

[code]program SimpleKiller;
{.include ssi2.txt}
{.include boxbreaker.txt}

var
foodeaten,monstercolor1,exp,report,report2:integer;
ax,ay,feather,monsterkill,attack,yellowattack:integer;

      ///////////////////////////////////////////////////
      //       SIMPLE KILLER BY SOLEMN WISHES          //

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
const //
monstercolor=15658736;//color of the monster you want to kill //
monsterexp=12; //exp you get from eah monster you kill //
eatfood=‘yes’; //either ‘yes’ or ‘no’ //
foodcolor=1743842; //if not set script fins automaticly //
chickens=‘yes’; //either ‘yes’ or ‘no’ //
feathercolor=9728; //if killing chickens the color of the feather //
lampskill=‘attack’; //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// ANTIBAN OPTION’S AND SETUP //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
randomwords=‘1’; //do you want to say some random words //
// 1=true 2=false //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
//REMEMBER THE FOLLOWING… //
//1)The first letter in the chat box starts with a capital, if my //
//anti-ban is not working this could be why. //
//2)leave feedback and comments pl0z //
///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

Procedure ClickM(mousex,mousey,ranx,rany:integer; left:boolean);
var tries,b,c:integer;
begin
GetMousePos(b,c);
HoldMouse(b,c,left);
repeat
wait(10+random(40));
tries:=tries+1;
until(tries>6);
GetMousePos(b,c);
wait(10+random(40));
ReleaseMouse(b,c,left);
end;

procedure solemnrandoms;
begin
loginifneeded;
FindBox;
findtalk;
FindLamp(lampskill);
findnormalrandoms;
FindMiscRandoms;
end;

procedure getfeathers;
begin
if(chickens=‘yes’)then
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,feathercolor,5,5,514,337,5))then
Mmouse(x,y,3,4)
begin
if(FindbitmapspiralTolerance(feather,x,y,5,5,757,491,50))then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
mouse(x,y,3,3,true)
flag;
wait(500+random(500))
end;
end;
end;
end;

Procedure GetFoodColor;
begin
if(eatfood=‘yes’)then
begin
if(foodcolor=0)then
begin
Status(‘You may of forgotten to set a food color, looking for food’);
mmouse(585,225,1,1);
wait(100+random(200));
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,‘Eat’,100))then
begin
getmousepos(x,y);
foodeaten:=getcolor(x,y);
writeln('Food Color is '+inttostr(foodeaten));
end;
end;
end;
end;

function Eat:boolean;
begin
result:=false;
if(FindColorSpiraltolerance(x,y,foodeaten,560,210,730,460,5))then
begin
result:=true;
Mmouse(x,y,6,5)
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,‘Eat’,100))then
mouse(x,y,1,3,true)
foodeaten:=foodeaten+1
end;
begin
if (result=false) then
begin
writeln(‘You have run out of food, logging out’)
logout;
terminatescript;
end;
end;
end;

procedure hpcheck;
begin
gethp;
If(GetHP<25)then
begin
mouse(650,185,2,3,true)
eat;
end;
end;

procedure TimeToDie;
begin
repeat
if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,monstercolor,23,23,495,318))or
(FindColorSpiral(x,y,monstercolor,100,66,415,276))or
(FindColorSpiral(x,y,monstercolor,210,130,300,220))then
MMouse(x,y,1,2)
until(IsTextAt2(9,9,‘Attack’, 100))or(FindBitmapToleranceIn(attack,x,y,6,6,126,23,150))
monstercolor1:=GetColor(x,y);
ClickM(x,y,2,2,true)
writeln(‘last killed monster color was :’+inttostr(monstercolor1));
flag;
begin
repeat
wait(1000+random(1000))
until(not(FindColorSpiral(ax,ay,65280,240,125,270,180)))
monsterkill:=monsterkill+1
exp:=exp+monsterexp
solemnrandoms;
getfeathers;
hpcheck;
end;
end;

Procedure KillReport;
var
RHours,Minutes,Seconds,RMinutes,RSeconds:LongInt;
Time:String;
begin
if(GetSystemTime-report2 > report60000)then
begin
Seconds:=(GetSystemTime) div 1000;
Minutes:=Seconds div 60;
RHours:=Minutes div 60;
Time:=inttostr(Seconds)+’ Seconds’;
if Minutes<>0 then
begin
RSeconds:=Seconds Mod (Minutes60);
Time:=inttostr(Minutes)+’ Minutes and ‘+inttostr(RSeconds)+’ Seconds’;
end;
if RHours<>0 then
begin
RMinutes:=Minutes Mod (RHours60);
RSeconds:=Seconds Mod (Minutes60);
Time:=inttostr(RHours)+’ Hours, ‘+inttostr(RMinutes)+’ Minutes and ‘+inttostr(RSeconds)+’ Seconds’;
end;
begin
writeln(’ ‘);
writeln(’///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////’);
writeln('Worked for ‘+Time);
writeln(‘killed around ‘+inttostr(monsterkill)+ ’ monsters so far’);
writeln(‘Gained around ‘+inttostr(exp)+’ exp so far’)
writeln(’///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////’);
Report2:=GetSystemTime;
end;
end;
end;

procedure Randomtalk;
var b:integer;
Begin
if(randomwords=‘1’) then
b:= random(200) + 1;
begin
If(b= 1)then
sendkeyssilent(‘total lvls?!’);
If(b= 2)then
sendkeyssilent(‘dam i really want a random event’+chr(13))
If(b= 3)then
sendkeyssilent(‘i cant wait till next xmas’+chr(13))
If(b= 4)then
sendkeyssilent(‘im saving for full rune’+chr(13))
If(b= 5)then
sendkeyssilent(‘cool’+chr(13))
If(b= 6)then
sendkeyssilent(‘how long have you been playing’+chr(13))
If(b= 7)then
sendkeyssilent(‘dam im hitting bad’+chr(13))
If(b= 8)then
sendkeyssilent(‘allmost at my next lvl yay’+chr(13))
If(b= 9)then
sendkeyssilent(‘how many feathers u guys got’+chr(13))
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
attack := BitmapFromString(47, 17, ‘z78DAED95ED0D00100C0557’ +
‘3285FD473280445E3F9470F7BBDAB83CD51A00D4D127DEB84B6E9’ +
‘F756765EE59C3F1E93E0398C18C8272CA5A63ADF44DF7B93A9B19’ +
‘6B7FFD7656DB77BE265F5677FFB364E66733957B464F6C6403473’ +
‘676DC2D0040160325AED402’);

yellowattack := BitmapFromString(47, 16, ‘z78DA33301805A360’ +
‘14D00FB801012A393CFC425D73F09B4C8CBD031BC294DB4E5E088’ +
‘C86CC68C8104312A38B5435A4AA24CF76F2C26A60D30CA9E613EF’ +
‘3B52437B70E626F2D22AADEBD9D134339243869EE50CF12996921’ +
‘29892129BF2B01D05A36014900A0088218426’);

feather := BitmapFromString(10, 14, ‘z78DA3330182CC0C5C2C2C’ +
‘4D80C8D3436364526F1E805CA3A3B9A1B1B1B9161EF80EB85902E’ +
‘E61646B8FD38E4FD0BF61DFDEDA50F0000CA1FA271’);

end;

begin
Username:=PermUser;
Password:=PermPass;
LoadChars(’’);
DisguiseScar(MaskName);
UpChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + ‘CharsRS22’);
ChatChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + ‘CharsChat2’);
StatChars:= LoadChars2(AppPath + ‘CharsChat2\fontsmall’);
CWindow := BitmapFromString(66, 8, ‘z78DA33304000372460’ +
‘800170890F1420C63DB473333D4D264664342E06CACCE11117D4F’ +
‘2C5E08C0BFC251BA61A4ACCA145BE20C66DD4F205EDFC4EAD928D’ +
‘76BA06BF083DE382F8D432506963A04488610FCE5C408C69F87D3’ +
‘454E28276651D754B636A95F994E76E5AD49E002F369293’);
MarkTime(LogOutMark);
MarkTime(RandomChatMark);
MarkTime(RotateMark);
MarkTime(KillScriptMark);
MarkTime(LeaveScreenMark);
GasColor:=8100004;
LoadSSIBmps;
ST:=GetSystemTime;
SetMouseMode(false);
if(SetCamera=’’)then
SetCamera:=‘N’;
if(LoggedIn)then
begin
{Face(SetCamera);
SendArrowSilentWait(0,1400+random(100)); }
end;
loadbitmaps;
repeat
timetodie;
KillReport;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic
